MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH11 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Harrison Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.57pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault located outside 1 Harrison Road and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.44pm on Thursday 25th February 2021.
